MCP Payment Wrapper

Payment wrapper for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers that adds payment verification and billing functionality

Interface: IAuthService

Defined in: interfaces/auth-service.ts:179

Authentication Service Interface Defines the methods for authentication and token verification

Call Signature

verifyToken(token, resourceType, resourceId): Promise<VerifyResponse>

Defined in: interfaces/auth-service.ts:202

Verifies a user token for a specific resource

Parameters

string

The user token to verify

The type of resource being accessed

"prompt" "resource" "tool"
